flawed_nl_solution:
Out of the 40, 40 x 1/10 = <<40*1/10=4>>4 students are absent.
So, 40 - 4 = <<40-4=41>>41 students are present in school.
Out of the 41, 41 x 3/4 = <<41*3/4=123/4>>123/4 students are in the classroom.
This means, 41 - 123/4 = <<41-123/4=41/4>>41/4 students are in the canteen.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 41. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
